title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 28, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 28, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Honeypots / Supply chain security

*   [Manuka (⭐336)](https://github.com/spaceraccoon/manuka) - Open-sources intelligence (OSINT) honeypot that monitors reconnaissance attempts by threat actors and generates actionable intelligence for Blue Teamers.

### Preparedness training and wargaming / Firewall appliances or distributions

*   [Infection Monkey](https://www.guardicore.com/infectionmonkey/) - Open-source breach and attack simulation (BAS) platform that helps you validate existing controls and identify how attackers might exploit your current network security gaps.

### Windows-based defenses / Overlay and Virtual Private Networks (VPNs)

*   [CobaltStrikeScan (⭐911)](https://github.com/Apr4h/CobaltStrikeScan) - Scan files or process memory for Cobalt Strike beacons and parse their configuration.
items.content_html:
Honeypots / Supply chain security

  • Manuka (⭐336) - Open-sources intelligence (OSINT) honeypot that monitors reconnaissance attempts by threat actors and generates actionable intelligence for Blue Teamers.

Preparedness training and wargaming / Firewall appliances or distributions

  • Infection Monkey - Open-source breach and attack simulation (BAS) platform that helps you validate existing controls and identify how attackers might exploit your current network security gaps.

Windows-based defenses / Overlay and Virtual Private Networks (VPNs)

  • CobaltStrikeScan (⭐911) - Scan files or process memory for Cobalt Strike beacons and parse their configuration.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Hybrid

*   [BlazorInAngularDemo (⭐32)](https://github.com/Xenoage/BlazorInAngularDemo) - ![last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/Xenoage/BlazorInAngularDemo?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=86400) Demonstrates how an existing Angular app can be migrated to Blazor gradually by integrating Blazor components, including calling Angular service methods. [Demo](https://xenoage.github.io/BlazorInAngularDemo/).
items.content_html:
Hybrid

  • BlazorInAngularDemo (⭐32) - Demonstrates how an existing Angular app can be migrated to Blazor gradually by integrating Blazor components, including calling Angular service methods. Demo.

items.title: Awesome AutoHotkey
items.content_text:
### Filesystem / Web

*   [SpicyKeys](https://spicykeys.github.io/) - Use hotkeys to open or move/copy selected files in Windows Explorer. Forum thread: [link](https://www.autohotkey.com/boards/viewtopic.php?f=6\&t=97171)
items.content_html:
Filesystem / Web

  • SpicyKeys - Use hotkeys to open or move/copy selected files in Windows Explorer. Forum thread: link

items.title: Awesome Xamarin
items.content_text:
### Charts

*   [MicroCharts ★1052 (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/microcharts-dotnet/Microcharts) - Create cross-platform (Xamarin, Windows, ...) simple charts.

### MVVM

*   [MVVMLight (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/lbugnion/mvvmlight) - Cross-platform MVVM development framework.

### Xamarin.Forms

*   [Xamarin.Forms.Skeleton (⭐467)](https://github.com/HorusSoftwareUY/Xamarin.Forms.Skeleton) - The latest trend for loading approaches in Xamarin Forms apps. Skeleton can be easily implemented on each view contained in your Xaml.
*   [MaterialDesignControlsPlugin (⭐270)](https://github.com/HorusSoftwareUY/MaterialDesignControlsPlugin) - MaterialDesignControls Plugin for Xamarin Forms is a collection of Xamarin.Forms controls that apply the Material Design Guidelines.

### Websites

*   [Xamarin Online Courses](https://classpert.com/search/xamarin) - A list of over 60 Online Courses (free and paid) from Classpert Online Course Search.
items.content_html:
Charts

  • MicroCharts ★1052 (⭐2.1k) - Create cross-platform (Xamarin, Windows, ...) simple charts.

MVVM

  • MVVMLight (⭐1.2k) - Cross-platform MVVM development framework.

Xamarin.Forms

  • Xamarin.Forms.Skeleton (⭐467) - The latest trend for loading approaches in Xamarin Forms apps. Skeleton can be easily implemented on each view contained in your Xaml.
  • MaterialDesignControlsPlugin (⭐270) - MaterialDesignControls Plugin for Xamarin Forms is a collection of Xamarin.Forms controls that apply the Material Design Guidelines.

Websites

  • Xamarin Online Courses - A list of over 60 Online Courses (free and paid) from Classpert Online Course Search.

items.title: Awesome Sre
items.content_text:
### Reliability

*   [How we’re building a production readiness review process at Grafana Labs](https://grafana.com/blog/2021/10/13/how-were-building-a-production-readiness-review-process-at-grafana-labs/)

### On-Call

*   [Elephant in the Blameless War Room: Accountability](https://www.blameless.com/incident-response/elephant-in-the-blameless-war-room-accountability)

### Service Level Agreement

*   [Service Level Disagreements](https://blog.b3k.us/2009/07/15/service-level-disagreements.html)
*   [How We Use Sloth to do SLO Monitoring and Alerting with Prometheus](https://mattermost.com/blog/sloth-for-slo-monitoring-and-alerting-with-prometheus/)
items.content_html:
Reliability

  • How we’re building a production readiness review process at Grafana Labs

On-Call

  • Elephant in the Blameless War Room: Accountability

Service Level Agreement

  • How We Use Sloth to do SLO Monitoring and Alerting with Prometheus
